Fazer uma analise seria e real.
Esse jogo tem muitos defeitos, muitos mesmo, mas os devs t√£o tentando (n√£o vou dizer que da melhor forma). Tem gente que vai dizer que √© desbalanceado para o sobrevivente e em alguns pontos essa afirma√ß√£o faz muito sentido, alguns v√£o dizer que √© desbalanceado pro assassino, essa afirma√ß√£o tamb√©m faz muito sentido. √â um jogo muito viciante, no momento dessa review eu tenho quase 400h de jogos, segundo jogo que eu mais joguei na steam, atr√°s s√≥ do warframe com quase 600h. Eu gosto muito do jogo e ao mesmo tempo odeio o jogo. Enfim √© uma rela√ß√£o paradoxal.

Dito isso, eu acho que a experiencia vale, pelo menos a compra do jogo base.

_______________________________________________________________________

I wanted to make a real analisis of the game.
Dead by daylight has tons of problems, but the devs are trying to make it balanced (maybe not the best way to do it, but they are trying). Some will say that the game is survivor-sided, others will say the game is killer-sided. The point is the game aren't balanced, and that is a problem in a competitive multiplayer game. 
DbD is addicting, when i'm making that review I haver almost 400h played, second only to warframe, I have almost 600h played in it. I like Dbd a lot and hate it a lot too. A paradoxal relationship.

That said, I think the game worthy, at least, the purchase of the base game.

Killer is super imbalanced. I can list off all the things that need a rework or need to be nerfed in some way. Nerfs: Iri Heads, Noed, Ruin, Tinkeres, Trickster, Spirit, Wraith, Almost all Iri addons, Purple addons on wraith, Clown, Bubba, Nurse, And Blight. And Devour Hope needs a rework. This game is SUPER imbalanced and heavily killer sided. Winning as Killer is just to easy. PLEASE FIX YOUR GAME

Muy buen juego... hay que meterle horas para empezar a disfrutarlo, ya que al no saber jugar la pasas mal y te la pasas asustado.. pero cuando le agarras la mano es genial, la presion y suspenso que mete es muy buena. Tiene varios problemas de bugs o complicaciones con la busqueda de partidas entre rangos. si te armas un team es mejor ya que jugas comunicado y se puede gestionar mejor  los papeles a la hora de correr, reparar o salvar.

If you are not really liking horror games, but not getting scared of every sight of killer then i recommend you this game. This is a balance between multiplayer fun and "WHERE THE FUCK THAT KILLER CAME FROM I GOT A HEART ATTACK"
You know that game is quite fun except when u get 3 other knobs on your team as a survivor and unfortunately thats every game so play at ur own risk it gets quite annyoing.

A very good game that is fun 95% of the time. A few annoying bugs stop it from being a great game.

I bought this game on sale for about ¬£5 and can say for the amount I paid for it, the hours you can put into the game are countless (as with all multiplayer games). This game has a multiplayer/ horror aspect which I find quite unique and was probably the main trait I found appealing. I've played for 100 of hours (on multiple platforms) and still enjoy putting time into this game. HOWEVER, the big let down for this game is the community. A portion of it (which seems like the majority when playing killer) is the most toxic environment I've ever been exposed to in my gaming history. If you can get past the constant annoyance of other people and see the fun in it, then I am sure you'll love this game as much as i do. The game is definitely worth buying on sale and at normal price but to get the full, best experience you should probably buy some of the paid DLC's.

Lo siento le he dado varias a oportunidades al juego pero no se puede. El matchmaking es un desastre te empareja nada m√°s empezar a jugar con rangos altos, tanto si juegas de survivor como si juegas de killer. Bajadas de fps cont√≠nuas, bugs que te inmovilizan en un sitio y no puedes hacer nada hasta que te tiran al suelo y cosas que denotan la falta de inter√©s por los desarrolladores. Y encima de todo eso, es de las comunidades m√°s t√≥xicas que he visto en un videojuego, siempre tienen una critica negativa tanto si lo haces bien como si lo haces mal,  abusan de las mec√°nicas del juego teniendo conductas que arruinan completamente la experiencia (tunneling, camping, etc...) Y claro, vamos a ponerle al juego una tienda donde le vamos a cobrar por tonter√≠as y as√≠ amortizamos el poco esfuerzo que hacemos porque la gente siga jugando. 

Solamente lo aconsejo si juegas con amigos, pero del solo Q ni hablar....
